en.title: FusionExcel Sponsors RM 5,000 Club Chek Quen Do (Malaysia)!
en.content:
FusionExcel is proud to sponsor RM 5,000 to support Club Chek Quen Do (Malaysia). Chek Quen Do (CQD) is a modern martial art of self-defense, which lays emphasis on both arts and morality. It is simple, easy to learn and practical. CQD is a mixture of various martial arts essences as well as the practical experiences of its founder. With the uniqueness of it's own systematic education and management system, CQD is established to deliver useful, practical and simple art of self-defense.

CQD focuses on techniques that are easy to master and proven practical in defending personal safety regardless of physical strength and environmental conditions. In practice, CQD stresses externally on drilling the veins, bones and skin and internally on art drills for spirit, breath and stamina. CQD also emphasize on morality values by creating a culture of loyalty, respect, wisdom, trustworthiness, kindheartedness, strictness and courage.
